body.name: Broom and Dustpan Set for Home - 48inch, 3L Capacity, 10" Great Edge, Lightweight & Detachable, Broom with Dustpan Combo for Kitchen, Office, Outdoor, Indoor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 45 mins
features: The 36 inches : made for a person 5 ft tall.
The 48 inches: made for a person OVER 5 ft tall.

【2 Size】 - The kitchen broom and dustpan set are available in 2 sizes: 36 inches and 48 inches, which can meet people of different heights. The 48 inches is suitable for everyone, and the 36 inch is specially recommended to fit for the boy, girl and under 5FT to use!

【Adjustable】- The 48 inches broom and dust pan set has 6 poles, which can be combined with various heights. Each pole is 14.5 inches, can be 2 poles into 1, or 3 poles into 1, or 4 poles into 1, make different heights to meet your needs.

【Large Capacity Dustpan】 - The dust pan with long handle broom is made of Eco-friendly PP and high quality stainless steel. Moreover, The long handle dustpan has a large capacity, which prevent garbage and dusty from dropping.
【Wide Use and Easy Carrying】 - The dustpan broom set can be used in many places, such as home, office, kitchen, lobby, garage, garden, indoor and outdoor.
【What you get】- 1 x Broom, 1 x Dustpan.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The kitchen broom and dustpan set is made of pp and stainless steel, durable. Easy to put together and Store. Allows you hanging or upright the broom dustpan set to store. The dustpan has a large capacity that can hold a lot of garbage and prevent garbage from spilling.

FGY Broom and Dustpan Set Our broom with dustpan combo set is widely used, not only can be used for kitchen cleaning, carpet sweep, floor cleaning, hair cleaning and so on, but also can be used in kitchen, room, office, lobby, garage, garden, indoors and outdoors.

FGY broom and dustpan set is available in 2 sizes: 36inch and 48inch. For the 36" broom dustpan set, we have specially prepared it for people under 5FT, which eliminates the need for customers to buy a broom that is too tall and not suitable for use. The 48" broom with dustpan set is suitable for all people, especially those over 5FT. In addition, we have multiple colors to choose from to meet your needs. We hope that our intentions will be recognized by you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't live without.
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 of these for a 2000 square foot house and oversized Lanai. We also have dogs and cats. So these are strategically located in the hallways of each side of house and one on Lanai. I don't know how I managed without. With the dust pan attached and strong bristles, it has saved me tons of time while Keeping pet fur to a minimum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was incredibly easy to assemble. The broom is also very sturdy and easy to store.The value this has is amazing and it was cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little flimsy but overall a good value !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broom is So So
reviews.reviewText: I like the set, nice length, and the dustpan is great. However, the bristles on the broom are as soft as a baby's brush. The broom needs to have heavier-duty/sturdy bristles to actually sweep items up. With the bristles being so soft you have to really push down and sweep to get it in a pile to be swept into the dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They thought of everything - best broom ever
reviews.reviewText: It is sturdy and pretty and the bristles get cleaned by the comblike feature on the dustpan which stands, so you don’t have to hold onto it while you’re sweeping. I use it in my kitchen for all the dog hair and other stuff that falls on It. I don’t have to drag out my vacuum. Besides, the vacuum isn’t great for all the nooks and crannies in my kitchen, especially close to the floor near the lower cabinets. I have had broom/dustpans before, but they have never been as tall as this one or as deep a dustpan, so that nothing falls out in your way to empty it. I just had to leave a review about this broom. I just love it. It is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for apartments!
reviews.reviewText: This broom and dustpan was PERFECT for my needs. Do keep in mind as many of the reviews say it is a smaller broom but I love it because it is so lightweight. It’s great for one bedroom apartments and smaller spaces in general. Assembly was a bit tough only because it didn’t come with instructions and you kind of have to figure out which pieces attach where. But I still assembled it in like 3 mins. The broom attaches perfectly to the dustpan for easy storage. The bristles are shorter but very flexible. Love the rubber edge and brush cleaner on the dustpan! Yes it arrived a little dirty but it’s meant to get dirty so idk why all these other reviews are mad about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and REQUIRES ASSEMBLY so thus constantly falls apart.
reviews.reviewText: I have NEVER purchased a broom before that required ASSEMBLY but here we are...... this thing arrived in a box about the size of a large shoe box. The broom and pan each have 3 poles held together by plastic sleeves. The pieces do not twist together, they just pop into place with very little keeping them there. I would have returned it but since the return shipping was half of what I paid I decided it's not worth it and I'll use this piece of junk until it breaks or until I get sick of popping the broom head back on that keeps falling off..... then go to Dollar General for a REAL BROOM that is sold in one solid piece. This product is absurd!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT BROOM SET
reviews.reviewText: VERY IMPRESSED WITH THIS BROOM/DUSTPAN SET....THE TEETH ON THE DUSTPAN IS A PLUS TO GET ANY HAIR OFF OF THE BROOM BRISTLES
The product mentioned telescopic handles for easier use without bending. But when it was delivered, there were 2 extra telescopic handles missing for the broom and the dust collection stick.
